messages.title: Security update required
messages.body: A security fix is available. Update Manny Rest Route Manager as soon as possible.

messages.title: Extensions may show as missing after install
messages.body: If you installed an extension but it still shows as missing, confirm both the Manny extension plugin and its dependency plugin are active in Plugins. Then reload this page.

messages.title: Operator playbook is available
messages.body: A step-by-step operator playbook is now included to help with installs, smoke testing, and troubleshooting.

messages.title: New plugin available
messages.body: Check out the newest Manny companion plugin for additional admin automation and diagnostics.
